description: When the temperature is cooler, try this seasonal fruit salad for breakfast served hot.
name: Autumn Fruit Compote Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, finely grated zest and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the dried fruits in a mixing bowl. Add the cinnamon, vanilla pod, and orange zest and juice. Pour in 200ml of boiling water. Cover the bowl and set aside overnight.
In the morning, transfer the contents of the bowl to a saucepan. Add the sugar and 150ml of cold water and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat and simmer very gently, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Remove the vanilla pod and cinnamon stick. Serve with a dollop of Greek yoghurt, or with porridge.
